data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Throw-in for Villarreal at San Mames.
David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Villarreal.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez waits before resuming play because Sergio Asenjo for Villarreal is still down.
Villarreal's Sergio Asenjo is back in action after a slight knock.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Villarreal needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Iker Muniain for Bilbao who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Iker Muniain for Bilbao is back on the field again.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno gets in a shot on goal at San Mames. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Alberto Moreno's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
The match at San Mames has been interrupted briefly for a check on Raul Albiol, who is down injured.
In Bilbao Bilbao attack through Raul Garcia. The finish is off target, however.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Raul Albiol has recovered and rejoins the match in Bilbao.
Villarreal's Javier Ontiveros breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
David Medie Jimenez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Goal kick for Villarreal at San Mames.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Bilbao.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Bilbao.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
At San Mames, Santi Cazorla has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yuri Berchiche is booked for the home team.
Bilbao drive upfield and Raul Garcia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Goal kick for Villarreal at San Mames.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
In Bilbao, Bilbao push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Raul Albiol.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
Raul Albiol returns to the field for Villarreal after picking up a slight injury.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Free kick in a good position for Bilbao!
Raul Garcia is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Can Villarreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bilbao's half?
Bilbao's Raul Garcia looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Bilbao.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao advance rapidly upfield but David Medie Jimenez blows for offside.
Bilbao are coming forward and Iker Muniain gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bilbao's Inigo Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Villarreal.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
At San Mames, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Villarreal's area.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Bilbao are whistled for offside.
David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Free kick Villarreal.
Ander Capa (Bilbao) gets booked by David Medie Jimenez, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Santi Cazorla is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Villarrealâ€™s Santi Cazorla is on his feet again at San Mames.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Bilbao.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Dani Garcia for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Bilbao's Inigo Cordoba breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
The first-half is over.
David Medie Jimenez has blown to start the second-half.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Paco Alcacer (Villarreal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
At San Mames, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
Bilbao push upfield but David Medie Jimenez quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Raul Garcia's header is off-target for Bilbao.
Goal kick for Villarreal at San Mames.
Gaizka Garitano is making the team's first substitution at San Mames with Inaki Williams replacing Ibai Gomez.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
An attacking Bilbao player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Pau Torres (Villarreal) gets a yellow card.
Vicente Iborra (Villarreal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Raul Garcia gives Bilbao a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Javier Calleja (Villarreal) is making a first substitution, with Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa replacing Vicente Iborra.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Villarreal's Paco Alcacer misses with an attempt on goal.
David Medie Jimenez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Inigo Cordoba (Bilbao) has received a first yellow card.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Villarreal) has received a yellow card from David Medie Jimenez.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a penalty in Bilbao...
Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) has received a first yellow card.
A massive blow for Bilbao as Inaki Williams misses from the spot.
Bilbao drives forward and Inaki Williams gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Throw-in for Villarreal at San Mames.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Bilbao's half.
The away team have replaced Santi Cazorla with Samuel Chukwueze. This is the second substitution made today by Javier Calleja.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Bilbao's area.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Bilbao.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Pau Torres of Villarreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bilbao at San Mames.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Villarreal's Paco Alcacer is on target but unsuccessful.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bilbao make their second substitution with Oihan Sancet replacing Iker Muniain.
Inigo Martinez (Bilbao) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Moi Gomez is replacing Javier Ontiveros for Villarreal at San Mames.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Villarreal's Samuel Chukwueze has been booked in Bilbao.
In Bilbao, Inigo Martinez of Bilbao is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Villarreal defence as Yuri Berchiche fires in a strike for Bilbao.
Villarreal needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Unai Nunez is replacing Inigo Cordoba for Bilbao at San Mames.
Oihan Sancet of Bilbao smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Mikel Vesga for Bilbao has been booked by David Medie Jimenez and receives a first yellow card.
In Bilbao Villarreal attack through Samuel Chukwueze. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bilbao.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Villarreal pushes forward through Manu Trigueros, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Villarreal needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Raul Garcia (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Unai Nunez (Bilbao) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
